title: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement torch==0.4.1.post2
body_html:
Issue description

In a fresh pipenv virtualenv (using Python 3.7 via pyenv), running pipenv install torch torchvision results in a successful install of 0.4.1 but also produces the following error:

Collecting torch==0.4.1.post2 ▉▉▉▉▉▉▉ 0/1 — 00:00:00

  Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement torch==0.4.1.post2 (from -r /var/folders/h3/59qfw93n6k92mh9lqzvpb1480000gn/T/pipenv-36_h8mxg-requirements/pipenv-wg1__hmp-requirement.txt (line 1)) (from versions: 0.1.2, 0.1.2.post1, 0.4.1)
No matching distribution found for torch==0.4.1.post2 (from -r /var/folders/h3/59qfw93n6k92mh9lqzvpb1480000gn/T/pipenv-36_h8mxg-requirements/pipenv-wg1__hmp-requirement.txt (line 1))

System Info

PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Mac OSX 10.13.6
GCC version: Could not collect
CMake version: version 3.12.1

Python version: 3.7
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] Could not collect

body:
## Issue description

In a fresh pipenv virtualenv (using Python 3.7 via pyenv), running `pipenv install torch torchvision` results in a successful install of 0.4.1 but also produces the following error:

```
Collecting torch==0.4.1.post2 ▉▉▉▉▉▉▉ 0/1 — 00:00:00

  Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement torch==0.4.1.post2 (from -r /var/folders/h3/59qfw93n6k92mh9lqzvpb1480000gn/T/pipenv-36_h8mxg-requirements/pipenv-wg1__hmp-requirement.txt (line 1)) (from versions: 0.1.2, 0.1.2.post1, 0.4.1)
No matching distribution found for torch==0.4.1.post2 (from -r /var/folders/h3/59qfw93n6k92mh9lqzvpb1480000gn/T/pipenv-36_h8mxg-requirements/pipenv-wg1__hmp-requirement.txt (line 1))
```

## System Info
```
PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Mac OSX 10.13.6
GCC version: Could not collect
CMake version: version 3.12.1

Python version: 3.7
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] Could not collect
```
